pendingCampaigns.title: Digital Education for Rural Kids
pendingCampaigns.description: Setting up computer labs in 5 rural schools to provide digital literacy training for children aged 8-16. We aim to bridge the digital divide and prepare these kids for the modern world.
pendingCampaigns.creator: Priya Sharma

pendingCampaigns.title: Plastic-Free Goa Initiative
pendingCampaigns.description: A comprehensive campaign to eliminate single-use plastics from Goa's beaches and tourist areas. Includes awareness drives, alternative product distribution, and waste collection programs.
pendingCampaigns.creator: Arjun Menon

pendingCampaigns.title: Senior Citizen Health Checkup Drive
pendingCampaigns.description: Free health checkups and medical consultations for senior citizens in urban slums. Partnering with local hospitals to provide basic healthcare services to underserved elderly population.
pendingCampaigns.creator: Dr. Kavita Patel

pendingCampaigns.title: Street Dog Sterilization Program
pendingCampaigns.description: Comprehensive sterilization and vaccination program for street dogs in Pune. Aims to control population humanely while ensuring the health and safety of both animals and residents.
pendingCampaigns.creator: Animal Welfare Society
